author: makortel
body:
This PR fixes two bugs introduced in #13348 
- MultiTrackValidator now expects TrackingParticles for efficiency to be a subset of TPs for fakes. HI configuration has selections for both, so the selections need to be done with Refs instead of copies (copies cause exception to be thrown by MTV).
- `trackingParticleNumberOfLayersProducer` needs to be added to the sequence

Tested in CMSSW_8_1_X_2016-03-02-2300, the workflows 140.1,140.2,140.4,145.0,301.0,302.0 that are failing in the IB should get fixed.
title: Fix track validation for heavy ions
